name: Klungons! (One Hour Game Jam 119)
description:
Enturprize! The Fuderation is under attack by Klungons! Fight them off with your Funton Torpedoes!

This game was made in under an hour using PICO-8, for the 119th One Hour Game Jam. If you're interested in how it works, the source code is available.

The theme for this One Hour Game Jam was 'where no man has gone before'.

Instructions

  • Use the arrow keys to move the Enturprize up and down.
  • Dodge or attack (press X) the Klungons!
